title: Losing LP due to forced repairs and terrible clients that dont load the game
body: ik i complain a bit on the boards, but im really upset that something is always wrong with my client. i login today as usual, find a match, champ select for ranked ends and the game is supposed to start. instead nothing appears on my screen for 5 minutes, appears in my task manager as a running program. try "ending task" and trying again to no avail. im now on here, trying to get the client to repair itself waiting for a response from the client saying its ready to go. im sure my game has ended as it has been 30 minutes without my teams jungler. is there any way to fix issues like this or when the match doesn't load without getting in lobby, not being able to load, and then regretting it later because you couldn't join the game and then losing 20 LP just because the client wouldn't open?

replies.body: Edit: repair fixed the client, but lost 16LP. guess ill have to continue trying to get that plat 3 promo

try putting in a support ticket? if they can see a direct link between the client screwing up and that kicking u out of games, then maybe they might make some adjustments to your lp? total guess (and hope!) here
how do i do that though? kinda upset i just lost 19LP from the game i couldnt connect to and another 20 just then...sigh
